name: about:addons Dark Blue
description:
Dark Blue theme for addons screen.

Managed to make disabled item opaque-red (i find it quite nice for "at-a-glance" purposes).

The usual buttons and row highlighting on hover is of course applied.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2016/09/04:
- found some missed buttons that only appear when unverified addons are automatically disabled by firefox.  Colored those...
- looks like something changed in "Get More Addons", so I tried to color that new display.  It kind of messes up the actual site when you browse it so I'll have to include that CSS in a separate style for Firefox Addons... when I get to it.  Also styled "discover more addons" box under "Services".
2016/08/09:
- colored ".addon[selected]" to match theme (instead of orange)
2016/08/06:
- added CSS for "Get Addons" (needed multiple namespaces - tricky!)
2016/08/06:
- it's alive!
